page.title: 12A DAY IN THE LIFE OF FARHANA
page.content: My life is very hard except at the weekends.My life is pleasant at times but I hate going to{mosque}because the teacher there is always hitting us when we chatter {Christians}have their {Bible}but our{Holy book}is called {Quaraan.}My life is hard because after school at five o'clock I have to go to the Mosque for an hour so I only get an hour to play out.Now about the food I eat,well,I can eat what every English person eats except the meat.I'm not a vegetarian,I do eat meat but only{Halaal}meat which is specially slaughtered while the meat that English people eat is{Haraam. My {Mosque life is very important to me {but I have an ordinary school life as {well.}I like coming to school and doing the work at times.I work hard because I would like to teach.I enjoy swimming most of all.
